idea:
Online Cleaning Technologies is a world leading provider of industrial shockwave cleaning solutions. Since founding the business in 2003, we have developed patented methods that ensure the safe and effective cleaning and de-fouling of boilers, combustion chambers and other industrial equipment, while your plant stays online.Minimize the impact of industrial, offline cleaning so you can focus on what really matters. The most challenging cleaning can be done more effectively with less shutdowns. Online Cleaning works together with a group of companies which jointly can cover all aspects of industrial cleaning.

From installation analysis for maintenance with innovative 3D scanning with 3Dwearscan till offline major and scheduled cleaning with proven technologies high pressure, shot blasting and vacuum cleaning.
name: OC TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED
